channel.title: CVE Feed for Cybozu, Inc. -- Cybozu Garoon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cybozu, Inc. -- Cybozu Garoon

item.title: CVE-2016-4907|2024-08-06T00:46:39.385Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 3.0.0 to 4.2.2 allow remote attackers to obtain CSRF tokens via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2016-4909|2024-08-06T00:46:39.803Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 3.0.0 to 4.2.2 allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of a logged in user to force a logout via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2016-4906|2024-08-06T00:46:39.522Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 3.0.0 to 4.2.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via "Messages" function of Cybozu Garoon Keitai.

item.title: CVE-2016-7801|2024-08-06T02:04:56.026Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 3.0.0 to 4.2.2 allows remote attackers to bypass access restrictions to delete other users' To-Dos via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2016-7803|2024-08-06T02:04:56.031Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in the Cybozu Garoon 3.0.0 to 4.2.2 allows remote authenticated attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via "MultiReport" function.

item.title: CVE-2016-4908|2024-08-06T00:46:39.909Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 3.0.0 to 4.2.2 allows remote authenticated attackers to bypass access restriction to alter or delete another user's private RSS settings via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2016-4910|2024-08-06T00:46:39.235Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 3.0.0 to 4.2.2 allows remote authenticated attackers to bypass access restriction to delete other operational administrators' MultiReport filters via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39457|2024-08-02T04:26:14.283Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 6.0.0 to 6.0.1 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability in PDF preview. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on a logged-in user’s web browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-39457|2024-07-19T16:47:46.468Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 6.0.0 to 6.0.1 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability in PDF preview. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on a logged-in user’s web browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-31399|2024-06-11T14:21:43.839Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Excessive platform resource consumption within a loop issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, processing a crafted mail may cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-31403|2024-06-11T13:49:23.480Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Incorrect authorization vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 6.0.0 allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter and/or obtain the data of Memo.

item.title: CVE-2024-31402|2024-06-11T05:21:04.938Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Incorrect authorization vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete the data of Shared To-Dos.

item.title: CVE-2024-31398|2024-06-11T14:54:17.236Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user who can log in to the product may obtain information on the list of users.

item.title: CVE-2024-31404|2024-06-11T14:22:13.532Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.5.0 to 6.0.0, which may allow a user who can log in to the product to view the data of Scheduler.

item.title: CVE-2024-31401|2024-06-11T18:53:43.047Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege to inject an arbitrary script on the web browser of the user who is logging in to the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-31397|2024-06-11T13:31:56.444Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Improper handling of extra values issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user who can log in to the product with the administrative privilege may be able to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-31400|2024-06-11T15:46:25.361Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.0. If this vulnerability is exploited, unintended data may be left in forwarded mail.

item.title: CVE-2024-39457|2024-07-19T08:36:27.786Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 6.0.0 to 6.0.1 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability in PDF preview. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on a logged-in user’s web browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-31401|2024-08-02T01:52:56.951Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege to inject an arbitrary script on the web browser of the user who is logging in to the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-31403|2024-08-02T01:52:56.908Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Incorrect authorization vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 6.0.0 allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter and/or obtain the data of Memo.

item.title: CVE-2024-31402|2024-08-02T01:52:56.517Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Incorrect authorization vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete the data of Shared To-Dos.

item.title: CVE-2024-31404|2024-08-02T01:52:56.710Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.5.0 to 6.0.0, which may allow a user who can log in to the product to view the data of Scheduler.

item.title: CVE-2024-31398|2024-08-02T01:52:56.926Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user who can log in to the product may obtain information on the list of users.

item.title: CVE-2024-31400|2024-08-02T01:52:56.946Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.0. If this vulnerability is exploited, unintended data may be left in forwarded mail.

item.title: CVE-2024-31397|2024-08-02T01:52:56.934Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Improper handling of extra values issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user who can log in to the product with the administrative privilege may be able to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-31399|2024-08-02T01:52:56.795Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Excessive platform resource consumption within a loop issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, processing a crafted mail may cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.
